participant_1.name: Jesse
participant_1.personality: Jesse is determined and somewhat frustrated with her current living situation. She has a strong work ethic and is looking forward to independence.
participant_1.background: they are constantly on my back. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. i work took i have a part time job at burger king.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Oliver is adventurous and compassionate, enjoying both the arts and community service. He has a nurturing side, especially as a piano teacher.
participant_2.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter. i'm a piano teacher on the side. my father played violin professionally. i play several instruments.
